s for Pilomatrixoma ?,"How might a pilomatrixoma be treated? Pilomatrixomas are usually surgically removed (excised). In most cases, the tumors do not grow back (recur) after surgery, unless the removal was incomplete.",GARD,Pilomatrixoma
